contentCards.title: Cloud Management Platform
contentCards.description:
Centralized infrastructure management through a web-based console.

Provides multi-hypervisor support, and features such as virtual machines, network, storage, automation, backup, and recovery.

contentCards.title: Integrated Monitoring Platform
contentCards.description:
Real-time performance monitoring for visibility of system health and resource needs.

Preemptive fault detection and alerts for servers, networks, and storage through service-level monitoring.

contentCards.title: Easy Deployment via Installation Wizard
contentCards.description:
Quick and simple installation of all HCI components using ABLESTACK's deployment wizard.

Single-platform installation on x86 servers, delivering everything needed for a cloud environment.

contentCards.title: External Storage Integration
contentCards.description:
Supports integration with external storage (SAN/iSCSI), enabling reuse of existing infrastructure.

Offers multiple storage gateways (block, file, object storage) for flexible use cases.

header.title: Company Overview
header.description: Stay up to data with AbleCloud News

description:
ABLECLOUD drives innovation through integration,

simplicity, and autonomy.

At ABLECLOUD,

we see endless possibilities through new platforms.
about.content:
Welcome to ABLECLOUD Inc.

As Korea’s only company specializing exclusively in virtualization platforms, ABLECLOUD leverages its deep expertise in virtualization

technology, proven cloud infrastructure solutions, and strategic partnerships with leading industry players to support data center operations

and drive IT innovation for our clients.

With proprietary capabilities in cutting-edge virtualization technologies — as well as emerging innovations like artificial intelligence and big

data — we deliver high-value platforms and solutions across public, enterprise, and service sectors. Our offerings include cloud data center

infrastructure, server virtualization, and virtual desktop environments.

We are committed to building lasting trust with our clients through continued growth and technological excellence.

Thank you for visiting us.

header.title: Use Cases
header.description:
ABLESTACK delivers solutions for any type of application and any business workload — without compromise.

It is an essential platform for driving both business and IT innovation across the enterprise.

infra.title: Server Virtualization
infra.description: Virtualize all your enterprise infrastructure and applications to maximize agility and efficiency.

infra.title: Private Cloud
infra.description: Strengthen your business with an HCI-based cloud that runs any application and scales effortlessly as needed.

infra.title: Hybrid Cloud
infra.description: With ABLESTACK, you can seamlessly expand your on-premises infrastructure to the public cloud.

infra.title: Edge Computing
infra.description: Support edge site infrastructure with compact hyper-converged technology, reducing the need for specialized personnel.

infra.title: Secure Infrastructure
infra.description: Implement zero-trust policies to effectively prevent cyberattacks and data loss.

infra.title: Backup & Recovery
infra.description: Provide integrated backup and recovery for both virtual and legacy environments.

infra.description: Ensure continuity with full data backup and multiple recovery options, meeting SLAs at minimal cost.

application.title: Big Data Analytics

application.description: Ensure stable operations and actionable insights with ABLESTACK solutions for deploying a variety of commercial databases.

application.title: Call Center Systems
application.description: Build call center systems that can be accessed anytime, anywhere, on any device.

descriptionList.description:
Mold supports a variety of hypervisors in addition to its proprietary Cell Hypervisor.

The hypervisors that can be centrally managed by Mold include :
list: KVM : Ubuntu 18.04 LTS, 20.04 LTS, CentOS 7, 8, RHEL 7, 8, 9, Rocky Linux 8, 9, openSUSE Leap 15, SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 15
Citrix Hypervisor : Versions 7.x, 8.x with the latest hotfixes

descriptionList.description: Hypervisors that cannot be centrally managed by Mold but can provide unmanaged HCI through Glue SDS include :
list: All hypervisors listed above that Mold can manage
Hyper-V : Windows Server 2016 or later, Hyper-V 2016 or later

descriptionList.description: ABLESTACK can be installed on a wide range of commercial x86 servers, including :
ABLESTACK supports a wide range of guest operating systems, including :
ABLESTACK is compatible with the following virtualization applications and platforms :

ABLESTACK Mold supports connecting a variety of external storage options beyond Glue SDS, enabling efficient cloud operations. The following external storage solutions are supported for use as block storage :
list: Citrix Hypervisor : Standard iSCSI, Standard NFS, SMB
Cell, KVM : Standard iSCSI, Standard NFS / POSIX-compatible storage
Others : GlusterFS, SolidFire, Ceph RBD, Datera, Cloudbyte, Nexenta, Dell PowerFlex, LINSTOR
ABLESTACK Proprietary : Glue Block, Glue Filesystem

descriptionList.description: ABLESTACK supports a variety of backup solutions, including :
list: Veeam and Dell Networker backup platform integration
Integration with Veritas and Commvault backup solutions
Support for Synology Active Backup for Business

cube.title: Cube os
cube.description: Cube is a Linux-based server OS that includes all ABLESTACK software packages, configuration wizards, and a web-based host management platform.

cell.title: Cell Virtualization
cell.description: Cell is a hypervisor designed to run virtual machines or containers by allocating specific zones within a host. It provides a platform environment that divides a host's resources into smaller units—like individual “cells” or “rooms”—to execute virtual machines dedicated to different roles.

glue.title: Glue Storage
glue.description: Glue is the name of ABLESTACK’s storage platform. It leverages the disks within the host to provide a unified storage space and deliver various types of storage services, perfectly embodying the characteristics of HCI storage. The name “Glue” signifies integrated storage, representing its role in connecting and managing data seamlessly.

mold.title: Mold Management
mold.description: Mold is a platform that enables the creation and operation of virtual machines while providing a wide range of cloud and virtualization-related features — including networking, storage services, automation, backup, and disaster recovery — all accessible through an intuitive web-based UI.

track.title: Track Network
track.description: Track is the platform within ABLESTACK that builds the virtualized networking layer, deploying a software-defined network (SDN) across the virtualization environment. It enables rapid deployment and utilization of user-isolated networks.

wall.title: Wall Monitoring
wall.description: Wall is an integrated monitoring platform for ABLESTACK, designed to monitor all infrastructure components, user virtual machines, and applications within the environment.

koral.title: Koral K8S Container
koral.description: Koral is a Kubernetes cluster automatically deployed through Mold, simplifying application provisioning, lifecycle management, cluster scaling, and container-based operations.

genie.title: Genie IaC Platform
genie.description: Genie is a multi-cloud IT automation platform that enables automatic deployment of virtual machines, applications, and state monitoring across multi-cloud environments based on user-defined workflows.

silo.title: Silo Storage Service
silo.description: Silo is a platform within ABLESTACK that provides a wide range of storage functionalities required for enterprise IT operations. It enhances storage scalability and maximizes the versatility of Glue in various deployment scenarios.

over.title: Over Fault and Disaster Management
over.description: Over is a recovery platform within ABLESTACK designed to handle various failures and disaster scenarios in virtual infrastructure and applications, effectively protecting an enterprise’s mission-critical applications.

link.title: Link Secure Network
link.description: Link provides a highly visible and secure environment to fully protect virtual machines and applications from attacks, while supporting connectivity with multiple public clouds.

cube.description: It can be installed on any x86 server without hardware dependency and delivers high performance through an optimized kernel and I/O processing modules.
subDescriptions: Standard Linux OS
Includes all packages required for ABLESTACK
Manage devices, services, and networking from anywhere with just a web browser
Deploy cloud environments easily using the built-in deployment wizard

cell.description: Cell is a built-in hypervisor based on Linux KVM, enhanced with optimized features for seamless ABLESTACK operations. The Cell hypervisor consists of the following key components.
subDescriptions: Integrated hypervisor within Cube OS — no separate hypervisor license required
Bare-metal hypervisor capabilities with the latest kernel support for high-performance I/O
Compatible not only with Cell but also with other hypervisors such as VMware, Hyper-V, and Xen

glue.description: Glue is a core component of ABLESTACK HCI, serving as the platform that powers its storage capabilities. The diagram below illustrates Glue’s functions within the overall ABLESTACK HCI Components:
subDescriptions: Provides large-scale storage using only the disks built into the server, with self-diagnosis and self-healing capabilities in case of failures
Ensures high efficiency by reducing storage usage by up to 80% through deduplication and compression
Supports unlimited capacity expansion during operation, enabling endless use cases

mold.description: With just a single click, most tasks can be completed, and both infrastructure and application operations can be automated for efficient management.
subDescriptions: Manage all virtualization resources through an intuitive management consoles
Provide multi-tenant cloud services through self-service capabilities
Manage complex IT infrastructure with minimal effort
Automate user-level workflows and enable automated provisioning via APIs and predefined scripts

track.description: Track provides an overlay software-defined network based on virtual routers, allowing you to configure and manage a variety of network functions quickly and efficiently.
subDescriptions: No need for separate appliance installation
Supports a wide range of network functions (L2, L3, DNS, etc.)
Ensures high security by blocking unauthorized external access
Full control over all network resources through an intuitive web-based UI

wall.description: As an enterprise-grade monitoring platform, Wall enables you to query and visualize metrics for all hosts, virtual machines, and infrastructure components within the ABLESTACK HCI environment. It also provides threshold-based alerts to ensure proactive issue detection.
subDescriptions: Provides real-time monitoring data
Supports custom monitoring for databases, web applications, and more
Sends alerts based on predefined threshold settings
Offers usage statistics to help predict capacity expansion needs

koral.description: With just a single click, most tasks can be executed, and infrastructure and application operations can be automated for efficient management.
subDescriptions: One-click simplicity
Supports persistent storage
Online scaling and automatic scaling
Provides high availability

genie.description: Genie is an automation tool built on a general-purpose language. Using pre-created playbooks, it allows users to perform complex, repetitive tasks across the organization with a single button—deploying virtual machines, containers, networks, applications, and more—without requiring any agents.
subDescriptions: Workflow-based automation
Automation across multiple cloud services, including AWS, GCP, and Azure
Predefined workflows simplify deployment and usage of various open-source platforms
Automatically monitors deployed resources and their status
Connects to various commercial SDS solutions for flexible storage expansion
Provides an object storage gateway and browser interface for big data and AI data management
Supports connections to bare-metal servers and hypervisors
Enables diverse storage usage through a web browser, including object storage browser and web-based NAS
Active-Active DR
Supports DR (Disaster Recovery) settings at the virtual machine level through an intuitive UI, enabling efficient DR management, provides state monitoring for individual virtual machines
Supports server redundancy to ensure uninterrupted operation of mission-critical applications
High security based on Zero Trust principles with multi-cloud connectivity
Supports isolation of virtual machines, containers, and applications to protect critical applications and shared services
Software-defined security policy management for centralized control
